goalies.rotation_note: Woll remains starter after solid performance vs ANA (.900 SV%). Stolarz expected next start if back-to-back arises.

opponent_scouting.identity: Fast-transition, forecheck-heavy team built around Larkin and Raymond. Likes 1-2-2 Aggressive Neutral Zone with quick stretch passes.
opponent_scouting.pp_focus: High umbrella through Seider; Larkin bumper looks low-slot.
opponent_scouting.pk_tendency: High pressure, collapses late if puck controlled low.

defense.notes: Detroit thrives on neutral-zone turnovers — reduce pinches early and tighten support through middle lane.

offense.entry_focus: Controlled zone entries over dump-and-chase to counter Detroit's mobile D.

forwards.notes: Top six emphasize sustained O-zone pressure; bottom six tasked with low-cycle grind shifts vs Larkin line.

matchups.pair2: Dumba / Tanev — physical containment vs Raymond/Berggren speed
matchups.pair3: OEL / Timmins — puck movement, 3rd pairing ozone starts

powerplay.unit1_focus: Left-flank Marner, right-slot Nylander, Tavares bumper.
powerplay.unit2_focus: Mercer–Foerster combo, look short-side wrister seam.
powerplay.pp_adapt: If DET pressures high, drop Nylander low-side and rotate bumper high.

penalty_kill.structure: Diamond vs umbrella; box vs overload.
penalty_kill.notes: Detroit likes to feed Seider high — stay tight to Larkin bumper.

trailing_by_1_after_2.note: Push tempo with high forecheck, trust Woll rebound control.

leading_late.matchups: Deploy Carlo/Tanev vs Larkin every shift final 3 mins.

keys_to_win: 1️⃣ Avoid east-west passes through DET neutral trap.
2️⃣ Force them low with quick entries; use cycle to draw their wingers deep.
3️⃣ Stay disciplined — DET's PP top-10 in conversion rate.
4️⃣ Test Husso early — glove side low shots in traffic.
5️⃣ Keep Woll sharp: low shot volume against = focus lapses possible.
coach_quote: Detroit punishes mistakes through the neutral zone — stay patient, grind, and let our structure wear them down. Don’t force pretty plays through their trap.
